SINT_Execution_Output.Summary: FD and SINT prompt synthesized with Scenario 3B (Consensus). Four tasks prepared with explicit methods for Cases 2–5.

Task.title: Coastal Flood Defense Strategy under Sea-Level Rise
Task.objective: Run a conflict debate to balance protection efficacy, environmental impact, and community disruption for coastal defenses.
Task.context: Sea-level projections, storm surge statistics, ecosystem services, construction constraints, funding.
Task.methodology: Debates (N=3) with Step 3A (Conflict), ≥2 rounds with Divergence Ratings and compromise synthesis.
Task.experts: - Coastal Engineering Lead - Environmental Impact Analyst - Community Resilience and Planning Officer
Task.constraints: PCG; numeric ratings each round; cross-evaluation; Dual Output + Verification.
Task.expected_outcomes: Phased defense portfolio with thresholds and monitoring KPIs.

Task.title: Open Data Governance for a Smart City Platform
Task.objective: Integrate privacy, utility, and interoperability into a consensus governance roadmap for city open data.
Task.context: PII handling, licensing, APIs/standards, civic innovation, vendor lock-in risks.
Task.methodology: Debates (N=3) with Step 3B (Consensus); integrate and prioritize.
Task.experts: - Chief Data Officer - Civic Tech Community Representative - Legal and Compliance Counsel
Task.constraints: PCG; ratings and cross-evaluation at Step 2; Dual Output + Verification.
Task.expected_outcomes: Prioritized governance policies with measurable targets and review cadence.

Task.title: Model Routing and Safety Gates for Customer Support LLMs
Task.objective: Use Generator+Critic to create routing rules and safety gates ensuring QoS and safety for customer support LLMs.
Task.context: Tiered models, content filters, escalation to human, latency SLOs, cost budgets.
Task.methodology: Generator + External Critic (N=2) with corrections and rating gates.
Task.experts: - Conversational AI Architect (Generator) - Trust & Safety and Finance Controller (Critic)
Task.constraints: PCG; numeric ratings for risk/coverage; Dual Output + Verification.
Task.expected_outcomes: Gated routing protocol with metrics, test hooks, and rollback triggers.

Task.title: Regional Food System Resilience under Supply Shocks
Task.objective: Conduct a conflict debate to design interventions enhancing resilience to supply chain disruptions.
Task.context: Storage capacity, diversified sourcing, transportation, perishables, equity in access.
Task.methodology: Debates (N=4) with Step 3A (Conflict), ≥2 rounds with divergence ratings and compromise.
Task.experts: - Supply Chain Optimization Specialist - Agricultural Economist - Public Health and Nutrition Planner - Logistics Operations Manager
Task.constraints: PCG; ratings and cross-evaluation; Dual Output + Verification.
Task.expected_outcomes: Ranked intervention portfolio with triggers and monitoring.
